channel.title: I challenge you to remix your first track
channel.description: The original MUST be at least a year old. You will delete your arrangement, and basically compose it to the best of your capabilities. You can add, delete, or not use all of the scenes, it is up to you. After you are done, either share them both here from SoundCloud or from the project files. We will be able to see and hear each other’s progress. It will be fun :) I am currently working on something like this and I thought I would share my challenge idea with others. Good luck!

item.title: I challenge you to remix your first track
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/nano

Already did this in a way, this was my first ever song using auxy, from the creator studio era, recreated and remixed in the new app. I don’t have a copy of the original rendered, as it was just loops, so I did my best to arrange it how I remember it going. xD

Read full topic
item.source: I challenge you to remix your first track

item.title: I challenge you to remix your first track
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:
Well, here it is, I remixed my very first song in Auxy-

Here is my remix turned official release: https://soundcloud.com/zephsound/exium

Here is the OG: https://app.auxy.co/projects/JjEqNmPe1SkL1sVy_mnsIg==

I deleted the OG from my SoundCloud like two weeks ago to make space lol, so I have to provide the project link
